altername_name: Hidden Mysteries: Buckingham Palace: Auf den Spuren der Royals
name: Hidden Mysteries: Buckingham Palace: Secrets of Kings and Queens
overview: 30+ unique Buckingham Palace locations to explore for clues 45+ levels - each level can be visited again and again for more clues and increased playability 100s of hidden objects that appear randomly throughout the game - use the objects found to unlock additional clues Combine special items to solve puzzles Each act is completed with a unique puzzle
